short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a means of communication between EpsilonNet's web applications and EpsilonNet's Devices Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension acts as a middle layer between two applications: Epsilon Net's web applications and Epsilon Net's Devices Manager desktop application. Its main purpose is to forward printing commands generated by the web application to the desktop application and acquire their result. 
On the extensionâ€™s options, the local http address of a service running in the desktop application is stored. The extension uses this address to forward the printing commands to it. 
This extension makes no changes to your browser. 
Anyone who runs the Epsilon Net's web applications and wishes to forward the printing of documents directly to a local printer, should install this extension.
